title: Never Give Up
description: Inspired by spirit and shared through the love of spirit, this book of uplifting and thought provoking poetry will touch your heart. Tyna McKechnie is a 1:1 support worker for adults with learning disabilities, and her profound experiences in this work are reflected in her poetry. She is also a spiritualist and a medium, and her beliefs shine through in her work too.Published by North Lincs Spiritualists using CreateSpace Independent Publish Platform.
author: Tyna McKechnie
